message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DL 

This paper deals with the classification of metrics and algorithms for related terms search, which is a common task in natural language processing and information retrieval. The use of WordNet, Roget's Thesaurus, and Wikipedia, as well as the proposed test collection of Russian word pairs, suggests that this paper is likely to belong to the sub-categories of computational linguistics (cs.CL), information retrieval (cs.IR), and machine learning (cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DL).
